title: Spider (Ape Atoll)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Spiders can be found around Ape Atoll, they are aggressive and will poison the player.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Spider (Ape Atoll)The RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Spider (Ape Atoll)
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page
This article is about the spider found on Ape Atoll. For other uses, see Spider (disambiguation).
Spider

MembersYes

Size1x1
ExamineIt's an extremely small brown spider, probably very poisonous.

Monster ID5238,5239

Spiders can be found around Ape Atoll, they are aggressive and will poison the player.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 Tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Location Levels Members Spawns Map

Ape Atoll Dungeon129Maplink
Banana plantation (Ape Atoll)116Maplink
Temple of Marimbo Dungeon122Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 130,000 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Clue scroll (beginner)1RareNot sold12

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

The poison damage inflicted was reduced further from 2 to 1.

Date unknown

The poison damage inflicted was reduced from 5 to 2.
